title: AWS Tagalog TwitterBot
description: No longer works because of changes to the Twitter platform :(. A program written in Node.js which retrieves data from a MongoDB database via an API I made! AWS Lambda was then used to trigger the bot daily.

title: Personal Website
description: Full stack website using React.js, ASP.NET Core and Microsoft SQL Server. Deployed using Azure and then redeployed on a free platform because of the price ;)
technologies: React.js, ASP.NET Core, C#, Microsoft SQL Server, Azure Web App Services

title: Gym Progress Tracker
description: Webapp which uses your browser's local storage to let you track your gym progress without having to save anything! (Currently making an IOS version as I'm lerning Swift. Stay tuned!)
